<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Migrates the source column to wsd_source (avoiding conflicts with other applications that may create a 'source' column on the cmn_location table)</description>
        <name>Migrate source to wsd_source</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var logPrefix = 'Migrate source to wsd_source (Fix Script): ';
	
	var updateRows = function(table, encodedQuery) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
		gr.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
		gr.query();
		gs.info(logPrefix + 'Found ' + gr.getRowCount() + ' in the ' + table + ' table matching query ' + encodedQuery);
		while(gr.next()) {
			gr.source = '';
			gr.wsd_source = 'mappedin';
			gr.setWorkflow(false);
			gr.update();
		}
		
		gr = new GlideAggregate(table);
		gr.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
		gr.addAggregate('COUNT');
		gr.setGroup(false);
		gr.query();
		
		if (!gr.next())
			throw 'Unable to get count of matching records after updating the ' + table + ' table';
		
		var count = parseInt(gr.getAggregate('COUNT'));
		if (isNaN(count))
			throw 'Count aggregate is not a number for the ' + table + ' table: ' + gr.getAggregate('COUNT');
		
		if (count !== 0)
			throw 'Could not successfully update all records for the ' + table + ' table. Remaining records: ' + count;
	};
	
	var location = new GlideRecord('sn_wsd_core_workplace_location');
	if (!location.isValidField('source')) {
		gs.info(logPrefix + 'Source column does not exist. Migration skipped.');
		return;
	}
	
	try {
		updateRows('sn_wsd_core_building', 'wsd_source=^last_importedISNOTEMPTY^external_idISNOTEMPTY^sourceISEMPTY^ORsource=mappedin');
		updateRows('sn_wsd_core_floor', 'wsd_source=^building.wsd_source=mappedin');
		updateRows('sn_wsd_core_space', 'wsd_source=^building.wsd_source=mappedin');
	} catch(e) {
		gs.error(logPrefix + 'ERROR: ' + e);
	}
	
	gs.info(logPrefix + 'source to wsd_source migration successful');
})();]]></script>
